content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DTHREL
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000226
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verifying presence of SEND variable --DTHREL
Outcome:
  Message: --DTHREL must never be used in SDTM-based data for human clinical trials
  Output Variables:
    - --DTHREL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Variable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0352
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'The following SDTM variables, defined for use in
                  non-clinical studies (SEND), must  NEVER be used in the submission
                  of SDTM-based data for human clinical trials: --DTHREL (Findings)
                  --EXCLFL (Findings) --REASEX (Findings) --DETECT (Findings)'
                Document: Model v1.4
                Item: '   '
                Section: '2.7'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

Outcome.Message: --DTHREL must never be used in SDTM-based data for human clinical trials

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The following SDTM variables, defined for use in non-clinical studies (SEND), must  NEVER be used in the submission of SDTM-based data for human clinical trials: --DTHREL (Findings) --EXCLFL (Findings) --REASEX (Findings) --DETECT (Findings)
